intro: Onosma urumensis, commonly known as the Urumqi onosma, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of Central Asia. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss in its harsh environment. Onosma urumensis is often found in rocky soils and is adapted to survive in low-nutrient, dry conditions.
